news.title: Nothing opens its first retail store in India
news.summary: The two-story location will sell products from Nothing and the more affordable, mass-market brand CMF.

news.title: Indian pharmacy chain giant exposed customer data and internal systems
news.summary: A backend flaw in web admin dashboards used by one of India's largest pharmacy chains, exposed thousands of online pharmacy orders.

news.title: Airbnb plans to bake in AI features for search, discovery and support
news.summary: Airbnb CEO Brian Chesky said the company wants to increase its use of large language models for customer discovery, support and engineering.

news.title: Airbnb says a third of its customer support is now handled by AI in the US and Canada
news.summary: Airbnb was poised to introduce an app that doesn't just search for you, but one that "knows you." CEO Brian Chesky said, "It will help guests plan their entire trip, help hosts better run their businesses, and help the company operate more efficiently at scale."

news.title: Fintech lending giant Figure confirms data breach
news.summary: The company said hackers downloaded “a limited number of files” after breaking into an employee’s account. The hacking group ShinyHunters took responsibility for the breach.
